title: Our Story
text: Trenchers, which means a wooden board or platter on which food is carved or served, is that place where you can come and enjoy a wide variety of draft beer & cider while watching your favorite game. You name it: Seahawks, Kraken, Sounders, Mariners, College Football, NFL, MLS, FIFA. You can find it in any of our +17 TVs.  We have 30 beers on tap, including all your old favorites and always something new. We rotate them frequently so there is always an excuse to come back. Come watch the game, hang with family & friends and meet new ones! Choose indoor and outdoor seating with live music, trivia, comedy nights and a friendly staff! Trenchers has been here for every celebration or heart break for more than 10 years, 7 days a week.
